record.title: ORDERS FOR FRIDAY, JANUARY 25, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR FRIDAY, JANUARY 25, 2008 -- (Senate - January 24, 2008)

[Page: S302]

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 9:30 a.m. Friday, January 25; that on Friday following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, and the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day; and the Senate then resume consideration of S. 2248, the FISA legislation.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
